Name: Peaceful Gunner
About the game: Peace, love, and... GUNS! Peaceful Gunner is a shooter-defense game about good vibes. Shoot some magical flowers to turn soldiers into hippies and make the world a better place (or not). None... just shoot, upgrade, and shoot more. There are some shitty boss fights by the way. Screw this! Just light the bong and chill. Average gameplay time: 2 hours (sober), 12 hours (stoned)
